duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and lead handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and post-project work.
Provide expertise in science topics for Elementary, Middle, and High School Science, and apply state and national science standards.
Communicate clearly via chat, email, phone, and videoconference meetings; interact with customers and educators in-person and virtually.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers; train Science and potentially Math items to a varied scorer population.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science or Physical Sciences (Master's preferred)
Two (2) years experience as a Scoring Director or other scoring team lead
